sentences.english: Topics covered include subscribing to the blog and utilizing the different search features. To view the screencast, click here.
sentences.chinese: 涵盖的主题包括如何订阅博客和使用搜索功能。

sentences.english: In fact, it is more of a philosophy that envelops every aspect of the project.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，它更是一种涵盖了项目的各个方面的哲学。

sentences.english: The urban esthetics history, a branch of esthetics, whose content covers widely.
sentences.chinese: 城市美学是一门内容涵盖面十分广泛的美学分支。

sentences.english: So the term “middle class” covers a multitude of differences.
sentences.chinese: 因此，“中产阶级”这个术语涵盖了众多的差异。

sentences.english: A Master policy covering different subject-matters insured of the same legal person.
sentences.chinese: 对于涵盖同一法人的不同保险标的的统括保单。

sentences.english: "people usually regard tourism as an umbrella concept".
sentences.chinese: 旅游常被看作是涵盖面很广的概念。

sentences.english: WHAT DOES THE CURRENT STATE SECRETS LAW COVER?
sentences.chinese: 当前保密法涵盖哪些方面？

sentences.english: It contains the whole gospel and the essence of the covenant of grace. It has been in great measure fulfilled.
sentences.chinese: 应许中涵盖了全本的福音，也蕴藏著恩典之约的精髓。

sentences.english: This name covers a wider and more reasonable.
sentences.chinese: 这样的名称涵盖较广，也比较合理。

sentences.english: This session covers the protocols and mechanics of multicast VPN (MVPN).
sentences.chinese: 本课程涵盖组播VPN的协议和机制。

sentences.english: His policy covered heart transplants, but not the cost of the mechanical pump.
sentences.chinese: 他的投保范围包括了心脏移植，但是没有涵盖机械泵。

sentences.english: The professor has covered a lot of ground in his short lecture.
sentences.chinese: 教授在短短的一课内涵盖很多领域。

sentences.english: Classical architecture includes the systems and building methods of Greece and Rome.
sentences.chinese: 古典建筑则涵盖了希腊和罗马的建筑方式及体系。

sentences.english: John Ma highlighting the key areas to be covered under channel management strategy.
sentences.chinese: 马世豪著重介绍营销渠道管理策略涵盖的关键领域。

sentences.english: Sydney's regulations apply only to new installations.
sentences.chinese: 悉尼的规定只涵盖新灯光装置。

sentences.english: The Bali Barat National Park covers nearly all the coral reef and coastal waters.
sentences.chinese: 巴厘岛巴莎国家公园几乎涵盖了所有的珊瑚礁和海域。

definition: to comprise/to include/to involve/to incorporate/to consist of
